title: Maintenance in all servers
body: This message is for all divisions of the bureau.  Starting today, the servers may suffer instability due to the latest maintenance mesures.    admin

title: Applications for CASA 137E/237E - Excavation at Catalhoyuk, Turkey
body: Our annual CASA 137E/237E - Excavation at Catalhoyuk, Turkey course applications will be opening to students & faculty at the end of October.   To assist us in hosting another excellent field course, please help identify students who would be an asset to the program and share the application packet with them. Copies of the packet can be found in the CASA mailroom and grants are available to offset the travel expenses for financial aid qualified students.  Faculty are invited to apply for one of our three guest slots to join the excavation for two weeks at a time. Priority will be given to individuals who have not joined us in past years.  Sincerely,  Dr. Hodder

title: your assistance is requested & a night at the opera
body: Lilith and Associates.  Solicitors and Advocates.  5th floor, Torre Chocavento.  Peru.  Dear A. [[surname]],  I am Mr. paul lilith, a Lawyer by profession. I am the personal attorney to Mr. [[surname]], a national of your country, who used to work with Lima Cellular Development Group in Peru, herein after shall be referred to as my client.  On the 21 st of April 2001, my client, his wife and their onlye child were involved in a car accident along Panamerica Norte express road. All occupants of the vehicle unfortunately lost there lives.  Since then I have made several enquiries to your embassy to locate any of my clients extended relatives. This has proved unsuccessful. I came to know about you through an enquiry I was making in the internet, and I found out you shared the same surname with my client, which is why I have decided to contact you, in order to assist in repatriating the money and property left behind by my client before they get confiscated or declared unserviceable by the bank.  Particularly, in a local commercial bank here where the deceased had an account valued at about US$ 10.8 Million Dollars, has issued me a notice to provide the next of kin or have the account confisticated by oct 8th.  Since i have been unsuccessful in locating the relatives for over 2 years now I seek your consent to present you as the next of kin of the deceased since you have the same last name so that the proceeds of this account valued at US$10.8 Million Dollars can be paid to you and then you and me can share the money, on the ratio of 50% for me, and 50% for you.  I have all necessary legal documents that can be used to back up any claim we may make. All I require is your honest co-operation to enable us see this business through. I guarantee that this will be executed under a legitimate arrangement that will protect you from any breach of the law.  As a token of my goodwill, please see my followup message with details for a night at the opera, expenses paid by my firm.  Please get in touch with me to discuss further details of this transaction by email or by using telnet to access our secure message server lc07.gb.uk.  Best regards,  Mr. paul lilith.

title: Your night at the opera for 2003.10.08
body: You are cordially invited to attend the Sacramento Opera on 2003.10.08 as the guest of the Lima Cellular Development Group, for a limited production of the critically acclaimed "Last Things Last".  Tickets will be mailed to the provided address shortly.  ATTIRE: Please wear appropriate attire for a night at the opera.   TRANSPORTATION: You will need to arrange for your own transportation, but your host has arranged for reimbursement upon arrival at the event.  ACCOMODATIONS: Due to the length of the show, arrangements may be made for overnight accomodations. Please contact your host for details and plan accordingly.

title: Sept Reimbursements Reminder
body: Dear Department Colleagues,  The reimbursement submission deadline is the second friday of the following month. September deadline is this coming Friday, October 9.  If you require assistance, instructions and copies of the reimbursement form may be found at the CASA admin office in Building 110. Please tape all reciepts to a blank sheet of paper so we can easily return a photocopy to the originating lab. All requests MUST be accompanied with original receipts.  Sincerely,  Ellen

title: CORRECTION: Your night at the opera for 2003.10.08
body: Dear A. [[surname]],  Due to a mix-up please pickup your tickets at the US Post Office on:  6929 Fair Oaks Blvd, Carmichael, CA 95608, United States at 1830 hours sharp

title: Offer Followup
body: You have a new message on our site, please login to view.
